job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Tableau: Automated Statistics
job.description: emTo get the best candidate experience please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating effortsbrbremstrong Job Category strongProducts and Technologystrong Job Details brbrstrongstrongJob DetailsbrbrstrongAt Tableau we are on a mission to help people see and understand data We create intuitive and powerful analytics software that enables thousands of leading organizations and millions of people around the world to find insights in their data The Augmented Analytics team is looking to advance us on this journey by putting the power of statistical analysis within reach to anyone with a data questionbrbrHave you ever wondered what made some marks in your visualization highbrbrAre there some extreme values that led to them Or could it be that some data that is not even in the visualization impacted those marks Maybe there is something unique and nonobvious about some of these marks Join us on the journey to build solutions that will answer these and many similar questions and hence help users understand surprising patterns in their visualizationsbrbrstronguWhat Youll Be DoingbrustrongulliAs a Senior Software Engineer on this team you willliliUse and advance our unique statistical engine to incept design and develop new capabilities in Tableau Desktop Server and Online SaaS productsliliAdvance your understanding of statistics and quantitative analysisliliDevelop in various programming languages including C and JavabrliulstronguWho You ArebrustrongulliExperienced  writing code and a consistent track record of shipping software Experience developing at the system level and with numerical methods is highly valuedliliPassion for statistics  Interested in statistics and eager to learn more about it A formal education in statistics is an asset but not a requirementliliVersatile  You have the ability to quickly jump between different technologies and are comfortable working from the UI down to the lowest level of an application stackliliData Enthusiast  You believe in Tableaus mission and are excited to play a part in it Your interest in data extends beyond your work lifeliliQuality mindset  You have high quality standards You believe that automation and writing tests for your own code as a way of maintaining high qualityliliIntellectually Curious  You have a passion to continuously expand your areas of expertise learning new ways to do things and understanding why things are the way they areliliA True Teammate  You enjoy collaborating with learning from and mentoring others You make the people around you betterliliThis role requires active collaboration with our other development offices and direct interaction with our customers Successful candidates should be comfortable working with distributed teamsbrliulstrongPosting StatementbrbrstrongAt Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay employee resource groups inclusive benefits and more Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefitsbrbrSalesforcecom and Salesforceorg are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender perception or identity national origin age marital status protected veteran status or disability status Salesforcecom and Salesforceorg do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes Salesforcecom and Salesforceorg will not pay any thirdparty agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Salesforcecom or Salesforceorg brbrSalesforce welcomes allbrbrstrong Accommodations brbrstrongIf you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Formbrbrstrong Posting Statement brbrstrongAt Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the
